title: Chloe Smith – 2022 Comments on Government’s Emergency Statement
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Chloe Smith, the Secretary of State for Work and Pensions, on Twitter on 17 October 2022.
content:
The Government has taken action to ensure economic stability by making the necessary changes to our Growth Plan.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

We remain committed to the long term reforms that will deliver economic growth but know that this must be underpinned by stability.
